lore: The Satyrs built passages that connect the strongest trees to the underground world, inhabited by the Inquisitors. To do this, they emptied the interior of these trees and built ladders to allow easy access between the treetops and the underground.\n\nThese creatures charge head on regardless of the size or strength of their opponent, taking advantage of their horns. If a Satyr town suffers a massive attack, they jump from the trees and plummet to the ground, sacrificing themselves while taking several Efts with them.
menagerieDialog: (It's playing a tune on a set of pipes, oblivious to your approach.)
Care to hear a new song I've written? It's called "The Art of War".
(It's busy shining its hooves with a cloth. Makes sense.)
(It's busy tap-dancing. This seems odd at first until you realize you'd do the same thing if you had hooves.)
(It's throwing a tantrum and stomping its hooves on the ground. Touchy little thing.)
name: Satyr Rammer
